meaning: An inferring, theorizing, or predicting from incomplete or uncertain evidence; guesswork.
An inference, theory, or prediction based on guesswork; guess.
(formal) A statement or an idea which is unproven, but is thought to be true; a guess.
To arrive at or propose by conjecture; guess.

A conclusion or inference based upon incomplete or uncertain evidence.
To make a conclusion or inference based upon such evidence.
(formal, intransitive) To guess; to venture an unproven idea.
